column1: #Text=Mr. ,51 art in rose, pursuant to notice, to move for leave to bring in a Bill to prevent Bear-baiting ami other cruel practices.

#Text=The Honourable Member described several cruel exhibitions which had been recently promulgated, and amongst others some surgical operations of a Frenchman, called Majendie, who a short time since arrived in England, and at one of the Anatomical Theatres exhibited a series of experiments so atrocious as almost to shock belief.
#Text=He nailed the feet and paws of a greyhound down to a table with blunt spikes, lest in the throes of agony it should break loose from the sharp ones; and he then nailed down its ears.
#Text=He proceeded afterwards to cut out the nerves, and perform other experiments.
#Text=Member concluded by moving for leave to bring in the Bill.
#Text=On a division there appeared—For the motion 41 ; Against it 2U ; Majority 12.
